inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts

inclusion.criterion: regardless of the etiology of liver cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients taking antibiotics for any other infections within 2 weeks e.g. pneumonia, urinary tract infection..etc
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients taking antibiotics as prophylaxis for spontaneous bacterial peritonitis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency and frequency. Physical examination reveals tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles.
